product Name: Xiaomi Redmi 10A Dual SIM, 64 GB 3GB RAM, Factory Unlocked GSM, International Version - No Warranty - (Graphite Gray)
about: Display: IPS LCD, 400 nits (typ) | 6.53 inches, 102.9 cm2 (~81.0% screen-to-body ratio) | 720 x 1600 pixels, 20:9 ratio (~269 ppi density)
Factory unlocked smartphones are compatible with most GSM carriers. This phone is not compatible CDMA carriers like Verizon, Sprint, and Boost
Product Description: The Redmi 10A is fueled by a Non-removable Li-Po 5000 mAh battery and runs on Android 11 + MIUI 12.5 operating system providing smooth operation of the device. Powered by the MediaTek MT6762G Helio G25 Octa-core processor while the GPU is PowerVR GE8320. The rear camera consists of 13 MP sensor lenses while the front camera has a 13 MP sensor. The smartphone comes in 6.53 inches in size and the display is IPS LCD capacitive touchscreen that provides 720 x 1600 pixels resolution. Xiaomi Redmi 10A is equipped with sensors such as a fingerprint (rear-mounted), accelerometer, and proximity. The smartphone features micro USB 2.0, GPS with A-GPS, GLONASS, BDS, and Bluetooth 5.0. The dimension of the smartphone is 164.9 x 77 x 9 mm and it weighs 194 grams.

\n Produc.Included Components: Fast Car Charger, Wall Charger, Adapter, USB Cable
